Game: Disney's The Jungle Book 1993-01-01T00:00:00-08:00 Get down to the bare necessities of life and escort Mowgli through the jungle to the safety of the human village. Fight the boggle-eyed snake, Kaa, and defeat Shere Khan the hungry tiger in this exciting adventure based on Disney's classic!
